Title: CIA spy 'supposed to protect the world from evil' abused women across the globe
Description: A CIA officer who drugged, photographed and sexually assaulted nearly 30 women in postings around the world has been sentenced to 30 years in prison.

Description: Shakhtar Donetsk have spent a decade in exile, bombed out of their home by Russian forces.

Description: The UK and its Five Eyes allies have issued a cyber attack warning over a China-backed 'botnet' of more than 260,000 compromised devices.

Title: Huge scale of Starmer's gifts and freebies revealed - dwarfing all other MPs
Description: Sir Keir Starmer has received substantially more freebies than any other MP since becoming Labour leader, Sky News can reveal.

Title: Westminster Accounts: Search for your MP
Questions raised' after huge scale of Starmer's gifts and freebies revealed, says Tory leadership hopeful
Description: Tom Tugendhat has insisted it is 'important to be transparent' after it emerged Sir Keir Starmer has received substantially more freebies than any other MP since becoming Labour leader.

Title: Tory leadership candidate claims she 'became working class' after securing a job at McDonald's

Description: Sir Ed Davey has pledged to be a champion for carers - as he put his party forward as the 'responsible opposition'.

Title: How the assassination attempt on Trump is affecting US election bets and polls
Description: In any other race, an assassination attempt on a candidate would have been the most dramatic and potentially game-changing event.
